$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Plug.title: $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/PluginLibrary/Hint
$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Plug.text: The //Relink// library contains //Relink// as well as its supplemental plugins. It is maintained by Flibbles. See the github page for more information.

$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Butt.title: $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Buttons/NewAttribute/Hint
$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Butt.text: Specify a new widget/element attribute to be updated whenever a tiddler is renamed

$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Butt.text: Specify a new field to be updated whenever a tiddler is renamed

$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Butt.title: $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Buttons/NewOperator/Hint
$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Butt.text: Specify a new filter operator to be considered whenever a tiddler is renamed

$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Butt.title: $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Buttons/NewParameter/Hint
$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Butt.text: Specify a new macro parameter to be updated whenever a tiddler is renamed

$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Erro.title: $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Error/InvalidAttributeName
$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Erro.text: Illegal characters in attribute name "<$text text=<<attributeName>>/>". Attributes cannot contain slashes ('/'), closing angle or square brackets ('>' or ']'), quotes or apostrophes ('"' or "'"), equals ('='), or whitespace

$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Erro.title: $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Error/InvalidElementName
$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Erro.text: Illegal characters in element/widget name "<$text text=<<elementName>>/>". Element tags can only contain letters and the characters hyphen (`-`) and dollar sign (`$`)

$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Erro.title: $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Error/InvalidMacroName
$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Erro.text: Illegal characters in macro name "<$text text=<<macroName>>/>". Macros cannot contain whitespace

$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Erro.title: $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Error/InvalidParameterName
$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Erro.text: Illegal characters in parameter name "<$text text=<<parameterName>>/>". Parameters can only contain letters, digits, and the characters underscore (`_`) and hyphen (`-`)

$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Erro.title: $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Error/RelinkFilterOperator
$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Erro.text: Filter Error: Unknown suffix for the 'relink' filter operator

$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Erro.title: $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Error/ReportFailedRelinks
$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Erro.text: Relink could not update '<<from>>' to '<<to>>' inside the following tiddlers:

$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Erro.title: $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Error/UnrecognizedType
$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Erro.text: Relink parse error: Unrecognized field type '<<type>>'

$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Tidd.title: $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/TiddlerInfo/References/Empty
$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Tidd.text: No tiddlers contain any fields, links, macros, transclusions, or widgets referencing this one

$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Tidd.title: $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/TiddlerInfo/References/Description
$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Tidd.text: The following tiddlers contain fields, links, macros, transclusions, or widgets referencing this one:

$:/language/EditTemplate/Title/Impossibl.title: $:/language/EditTemplate/Title/Impossibles/Prompt
$:/language/EditTemplate/Title/Impossibl.text: ''Warning:'' Not all references in the following tiddlers can be updated by //Relink// due to the complexity of the new title:

$:/language/EditTemplate/Title/Reference.title: $:/language/EditTemplate/Title/References/Prompt
$:/language/EditTemplate/Title/Reference.text: The following tiddlers will be updated if relinking:

$:/language/EditTemplate/Title/Relink/Pr.title: $:/language/EditTemplate/Title/Relink/Prompt
$:/language/EditTemplate/Title/Relink/Pr.text: Use //Relink// to update ''<$text text=<<fromTitle>>/>'' to ''<$text text=<<toTitle>>/>'' across all other tiddlers

$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/title.title: $:/core/ui/EditTemplate/title
$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/title.text:
<$edit-text field="draft.title" class="tc-titlebar tc-edit-texteditor" focus="true" tabindex={{$:/config/EditTabIndex}}/> <$reveal state="!!draft.title" type="nomatch" text={{!!draft.of}} tag="div"> <$list filter="[{!!draft.title}!is[missing]]" variable="listItem">
{{$:/core/images/warning}} {{$:/language/EditTemplate/Title/Exists/Prompt}}
<$list filter="[{!!draft.of}!is[missing]]" variable="listItem"> <$vars fromTitle={{!!draft.of}} toTitle={{!!draft.title}}> <$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/RelinkOnRename" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="no"> {{$:/language/EditTemplate/Title/Relink/Prompt}} <$list filter="[all[relinkable]relink:referenceslimit[1]]" variable="listItem"> <$vars stateTiddler=<> > <$tiddler tiddler=<> > <$set name="prompt" filter="[all[relinkable]relink:impossible]" value="EditTemplate/Title/Impossibles/Prompt" emptyValue="EditTemplate/Title/References/Prompt" > <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="show"> <$button set=<> setTo="show" class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/right-arrow}} <$macrocall $name=lingo title=<> /> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text="show"> <$button set=<> setTo="hide" class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$macrocall $name=lingo title=<> /> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text="show"> <$list variable="listItem" filter="[all[relinkable]!title[$:/StoryList]relink:referencessort[title]]" template="$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/ListItemTemplate">

$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/readme.title: $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/readme
$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/readme.text: When renaming a tiddler, Relink can update the fields, filters, and widgets of all other tiddlers. However, it works through whitelisting. It's already configured to update tiddler titles for all core widgets, filters, and fields, but the whitelists can be customized for each of this in the configuration panel. See the tw5-relink website for more details and examples.

$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/ListItemTe.title: $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/ListItemTemplate
$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/ListItemTe.text:
<$set name="classes" filter="[relink:impossible]" value="tc-menu-list-item tc-relink-impossible" emptyValue="tc-menu-list-item">
>> <$link to=<>><$text text=<> />

$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/TiddlerInf.title: $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/TiddlerInfo/References
$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/TiddlerInf.caption: {{$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/TiddlerInfo/References/Caption}}
$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/TiddlerInf.text: \define lingo-base() $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/TiddlerInfo/ \define filter() [relink:references!title[$:/StoryList]!prefix[$:/temp/]sort[title]] <$list filter="[subfilterfirst[]]"> <> <$list filter=<> emptyMessage=<> variable="listItem" template="$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/TiddlerInfo/ReferencesTemplate" />

$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/components.title: $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/components/button-delete
$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/components.text:
\define lingo-base() $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Buttons/
\define prefix() $:/config/flibbles/relink/

<$list filter="[all[current]prefix<prefix>]" >
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip={{$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Buttons/Delete/Hint}}><$list filter="[all[current]is[tiddler]]">
<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<<currentTiddler>> />
</$list><$list filter="[all[current]is[shadow]]">
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<tiddlerName>> text="" />
</$list>
{{$:/core/images/delete-button}}
</$button>
</$list><$list filter="[all[current]!prefix<prefix>]">
<$link><$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip={{$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Buttons/LinkToInline/Hint}}>{{$:/core/images/link}}</$button></$link>
</$list>

$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/components.title: $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/components/select-fieldtype
$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/components.text:
\define prefix() $:/config/flibbles/relink/

<$vars type={{{ [<signature>relink:type[]] }}} >
<$list filter="[all[current]prefix<prefix>]" >
<$select tiddler=<<currentTiddler>> >
<$list variable="option" filter="[relink:types[]]">
<option><$text text=<<option>> /></option>
</$list>
</$select>
</$list><$list filter="[all[current]!prefix<prefix>]">
<$text text=<<type>> />
</$list>
</$vars>

$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/components.title: $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/components/tables
$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/components.text:
\define .make-table(title, plugin, default-table-state:yes) <$list variable="render" filter="[relink:signatures<__plugin__>prefix<__category__>first[]]"> <$set name="table-state" value=<>> > > <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="yes" default="""$default-table-state$"""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-dropdown" set=<> setTo="yes"> {{$:/core/images/right-arrow}} ''$title$'' <$reveal type="match" state=<> text="yes" default="""$default-table-state$"""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-dropdown" set=<> setTo="no"> {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} ''$title$'' <$list variable="signature" filter="[relink:signatures<__plugin__>prefix<__category__>sort[]]"> <$vars key={{{ [removeprefix<__category__>removeprefix[/]] }}} > <$tiddler tiddler={{{[relink:source[]]}}} > <$reveal tag="tr" type="match" state=<> text="yes" default="""$default-table-state$"""> <$macrocall $name=<<__list-row-macro__>> signature=<> /> {{||$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/components/select-fieldtype}} {{||$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/components/button-delete}} \end \define tables(category, list-row-macro, header-list) <$vars column-count={{{[enlist<__header-list__>] [[DeleteColumn]] +[count[]]}}}> <$list variable="header" filter="[enlist<__header-list__>butlast[]]"> <<.make-table Custom "" yes>> <$list filter="[plugin-type[plugin]![$:/core]![$:/plugins/flibbles/relink]]"> <$set name="subtitle" value={{!!description}} emptyValue={{!!title}} > <$macrocall $name=".make-table" title=<> plugin=<> /> <<.make-table Core "$:/plugins/flibbles/relink">>
<
>
 <$text text={{{ [enlist<__header-list__>last[]] }}} />
\end

$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/configurat.title: $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/configuration/Attributes
$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/configurat.caption: {{$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/ui/Attributes/Caption}}
$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/configurat.text: \import $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/components/tables \define prefix-attr() $:/config/flibbles/relink/attributes/ \define lingo-base() $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Buttons/ \define element-name-tiddler() $:/state/flibbles/relink/element-name \define attribute-name-tiddler() $:/state/flibbles/relink/attribute-name \define row() <$set name="element" filter="[splitbefore[/]removesuffix[/]]"> <$set name="attribute" filter="[removeprefixremoveprefix[/]]"> <$text text=<> /> <$text text=<> /> \end \define body() {{$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Help/Attributes}} Add a new attribute: <$edit-text tiddler=<> tag="input" default="" placeholder="widget/element" /> <$edit-text tiddler=<> tag="input" default="" placeholder="attribute" /> <$reveal type="nomatch" text="" state=<> > <$reveal type="nomatch" text="" state=<> > <$relinkmangler> <$button tooltip={{$(lingo-base)$NewAttribute/Hint}} aria-label={{$(lingo-base)$NewAttribute/Caption}}> <$action-sendmessage $message="relink-add-attribute" element={{$(element-name-tiddler)$}} attribute={{$(attribute-name-tiddler)$}} /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> /> <$text text={{$(lingo-base)$NewAttribute/Caption}}/> <$reveal type="match" text="" state=<> > <$button> <$text text={{$(lingo-base)$NewAttribute/Caption}}/> <$reveal type="match" text="" state=<> > <$button> <$text text={{$(lingo-base)$NewAttribute/Caption}}/> <$macrocall $name=tables category="attributes" header-list="[[Widget/HTML Element]] Attribute Type" list-row-macro="row" /> \end <>

$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/configurat.title: $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/configuration/Fields
$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/configurat.caption: {{$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/ui/Fields/Caption}}
$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/configurat.text: \import $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/components/tables \define lingo-base() $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Buttons/ \define field-name-tiddler() $:/state/flibbles/relink/field-name \define row() <$text text=<> /> \end \define body() {{$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Help/Fields}} Add a new field: <$edit-text tiddler=<> tag="input" default="" placeholder="field name" /> <$reveal type="nomatch" text="" state=<> > <$relinkmangler> <$button tooltip={{$(lingo-base)$NewField/Hint}} aria-label={{$(lingo-base)$NewField/Caption}}> <$action-sendmessage $message="relink-add-field" field={{$(field-name-tiddler)$}} /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> /> <$text text={{$(lingo-base)$NewField/Caption}}/> <$reveal type="match" text="" state=<> > <$button> <$text text={{$(lingo-base)$NewField/Caption}}/> <$macrocall $name=tables category="fields" header-list="[[Field Name]] [[Field Type]]" list-row-macro="row" /> \end <>

$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/configurat.title: $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/configuration/Macros
$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/configurat.caption: {{$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/ui/Macros/Caption}}
$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/configurat.text: \import $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/components/tables \define prefix-macro() $:/config/flibbles/relink/macros/ \define lingo-base() $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Buttons/ \define macro-name-tiddler() $:/state/flibbles/relink/macro-name \define parameter-name-tiddler() $:/state/flibbles/relink/parameter-name \define row() <$set name="parameter" filter="[relink:splitafter[/]]"> <$set name="macro" filter="[removesuffixremovesuffix[/]]"> <$text text=<> /> <$text text=<> /> \end \define body() {{$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Help/Macros}} Add a new macro parameter: <$edit-text tiddler=<> tag="input" default="" placeholder="macro" /> <$edit-text tiddler=<> tag="input" default="" placeholder="parameter" /> <$reveal type="nomatch" text="" state=<> > <$reveal type="nomatch" text="" state=<> > <$relinkmangler> <$button tooltip={{$(lingo-base)$NewParameter/Hint}} aria-label={{$(lingo-base)$NewParameter/Caption}}> <$action-sendmessage $message="relink-add-parameter" macro={{$(macro-name-tiddler)$}} parameter={{$(parameter-name-tiddler)$}} /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> /> <$text text={{$(lingo-base)$NewParameter/Caption}}/> <$reveal type="match" text="" state=<> > <$button> <$text text={{$(lingo-base)$NewParameter/Caption}}/> <$reveal type="match" text="" state=<> > <$button> <$text text={{$(lingo-base)$NewParameter/Caption}}/> <$macrocall $name=tables category="macros" header-list="Macro Parameter Type" list-row-macro="row" /> \end <>

$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/configurat.title: $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/configuration/Operators
$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/configurat.caption: {{$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/ui/Operators/Caption}}
$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/configurat.text: \import $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/components/tables \define lingo-base() $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Buttons/ \define operator-name-tiddler() $:/state/flibbles/relink/operator-name \define row() <$text text=<> /> \end \define body() {{$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/language/Help/Operators}} Add a new filter operator: <$edit-text tiddler=<> tag="input" default="" placeholder="operator name" /> <$reveal type="nomatch" text="" state=<>> <$relinkmangler> <$button tooltip={{$(lingo-base)$NewOperator/Hint}} aria-label={{$(lingo-base)$NewOperator/Caption}}> <$action-sendmessage $message="relink-add-operator" operator={{$(operator-name-tiddler)$}} /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> /> <$text text={{$(lingo-base)$NewOperator/Caption}}/> <$reveal type="match" text="" state=<>> <$button> <$text text={{$(lingo-base)$NewOperator/Caption}}/> <$macrocall $name=tables category="operators" header-list="[[Filter Operator]] [[Operand Type]]" list-row-macro="row" /> \end <>

$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/stylesheet.title: $:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/stylesheet.css
